author: md3332017
title: Great Stay
text:
We live on 31st street across from your hotel. Our son turned 18 on March 11. We let him have the apartment for a sleepover while my wife and I stayed at the Roger.
Working with first William Rodriguez and Camille, we were given an incredible room that looked right over our building! Jen, Christine and the entire front desk staff were awesome -- as where the courteous and friendly doormen!!
What a wonderful experience you created for us.
We shall return!!
PS: I am Michael D. Drucker -- not Dr. Michael R. Drucker. I believe he has passed away but ALL of your correspondence to me addresses him.
Thank you.
